transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, good afternoon sir.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Sir, main Tejas baat kar raha hun sir IndiaMART company se.
Customer: Haan ji, bataiye.
Executive: Sir, ek chota sa concern na mere ko actually aaya tha aapke side se like kuch non-relevant buyleads ka issue hai, right?
Customer: Buyleads aur inquiry.
Executive: Bohot hi non-relevant, bohot non-relevant.
Executive: Sir, almost aapki jo buyleads hai woh non-relevantly aa rahi hai, aisa?
Customer: Sir, lagbhag lagbhag non-relevant hai. Abhi pichle ek do saal se, teen saal se aise ho raha hai. Otherwise pehle to buyleads bhi bohot hi zyada hoti thi.
Executive: Achha, theek hai. To like aap sir, you are the only one like jo manage karte hai account ya phir apna lead account manager bhi hai jo inse coordinate ho sakta hai? Kyunki like aap mujhe bataiye.
Customer: Main hi manage kar pa raha hun. Matlab ek batao kitne bande rakh ke karunga kya?
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Jab ek batao jab mere liye hi kuch nahi aa raha to main bande padha ke kya karunga?
Executive: Nahi nahi, woh sahi hai aapki baat. Woh to decision aapka hai sir ki aapko like rakhna hai koi ya nahi rakhna hai. Woh bhi manage kar sakte hai, theek hai. Ji, ji.
Customer: Yahan to koi kaam ki inquiry aati nahi hai. Haan, bande aate hai woh mobile itna irritate ho jaate hai, itna irritate ho jaate hai ki woh phir dekh ke chale jaate hai.
Executive: Achha, aisa. Aap to kaafi time ho gaya sir IndiaMART pe aapko rehte hue platform pe, 19-20 saal se hai aap.
Customer: Haan, bohot time users hai, aap purane user hai aaj ke nahi hai.
Executive: Haan, ji ji. Isme sabhi main aa gaya hun.
Customer: Pehle bhi aayi hai problems ko karenge karenge sir.
Executive: Are nahi sir, itne samay se hai to aur aage bhi rahenge, aisa nahi hai. Problem jo hai use bhi solve karenge.
Customer: Sir, dikkatein to bohot zyada hai na. Matlab yeh koi IndiaMART ke dhang ka kaam hai aisa? Matlab yeh bhi itna irrelevant inquiries hai, irrelevant inquiries hai, iska koi hisab nahi.
Executive: Achha, agar aap meeting pe connect kar sakte ho sir ek baar? Ek baar meeting pe connect kar sakte ho like message check kar paye hum thoda bohot.
Customer: Kya check karoge, bataiye?
Executive: Like jaise aapki jo product hai na usme mapping thodi si dekhni padegi because kahin na kahin mapping correct nahi hai that's why aapko irrelevant leads aa rahi hai. Jaise aap mujhe koi ek example bata do.
Customer: Are mapping to kai baar theek karai hai usme, sab cheezein karai hai.
Executive: Actually kya mujhse pehle aapki baat hua karti hogi I guess Priyanshi Verma naam hoga unka.
Customer: Haan, mere ko yaad nahi hai but woh madam thi to unhone bohot kuch yeh samjho ki isme theek karaya tha.
Executive: Nahi actually bohot kuch.
Customer: Theek hua hai ki nahi hua hai woh to nahi hai lekin dekhiye ek cheez hoti hai woh sabse important cheez kya hoti hai na ki dekhiye ek hota hai ki humne aapke liye kuch kaam kiya aur woh aapke kaam aaya aur ek hota hai ki maine aapke liye kaam kiya lekin aapko kuch change hi nahi hua.
Executive: To dono mein difference hai na sir.
Customer: Woh to aap bataenge.
Executive: To woh dikkat nahi hai. Main pehle ek baar yeh check kar leta hun. Chaliye ek do teen example leke aapse puchta hun pehle to ki matlab jaise non-relevant aap bata rahe ho na ki kis kis tarike se hai. Jaise abhi jaise kya hai electro fusion welding machine aati hai apni, right?
Customer: To is category ke andar humko buyleads woh inquiry ka flow kam aa raha hoga.
Customer: Right?
Executive: Theek hai. Ab kya hai ki retail inquiries aa rahi hai retail bilkul jisko kehte hai ki business to business nahi aa rahi koi matlab koi ghar ke liye maang raha hai koi khet ke liye maang raha hai. Matlab really aisa lag raha hai jaise main dukaan khol ke baitha hun dukaan wale se achcha business kar lete hai usse niche.
Customer: Almost saari retail inquiries.
Executive: Samajh gaya. Achha aur ab jaise main aapko baar baar puchun ki jaise maan ke chaliye hamari woh jo leads hoti hai na jo maan ke chaliye koi recent wali leads hoti hai jo fresh leads aati hai to woh consume ho pa rahi hai aapke side se?
Customer: Consume dhang ki aaye to phir main karun na.
Executive: Haan matlab aap aise panel pe active hai.
Customer: Bilkul irrelevant aati hai main matlab time pass karne ke liye baitha hun mere ko aisa lag raha hai.
Executive: Achha, aisa scene ho raha hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ek second rukiyega, main ek bari cheez aur check kar lun. Ab main jo buyleads ka flow hai woh kis kis category mein aa raha hai? Automotive square parts ke zyada aa rahe hai, agriculture pipes ki aa rahi hai, plumbing pipes ki aa rahi hai, industrial plastic pipes ki aa rahi hai, theek hai. Aur aapka jo construction hai woh theek hai. Auto refresher tool bhi use karte ho kya aap sir koi?
Customer: Auto? Nahi auto refresher se lena dena nahi hai. No no.
Executive: Nahi jaise main aapko ek meeting link share karta hun. Main aapko do teen cheezein batata hun thoda sa usse cheezein change hongi. Jo aap keh rahe ho na retail leads aa rahi hai jo aisi leads aa rahi hai jo exhaust ho chuki hai jo matlab jinse bas baat hi ho rahi hai kuch conversion nikal ke nahi aa raha yeh wali cheez aa rahi hai na?
Customer: Yeh pata nahi kya hai main lead purchase karta hun woh apna gana gana shuru kar dete hai ji hum yeh product banate hai.
Executive: Haan matlab yahi bolte honge na ki main bas price lekar aata ya maine sirf inquiry ke liye phone kiya tha aisa kuch.
Customer: Nahi nahi woh apna product bechna shuru kar dete hai.
Executive: Achha, aisa bhi hota?
Customer: Aur kya? Woh aapko apna product bech rahe hai. Job dhoond raha hai, koi apna product bech raha hai. Koi matlab loan de raha hai, koi kuch kar raha hai, koi kuch kar raha hai.
Executive: Achha abhi tak aapne koi bhi lead non-relevant mark kari hai?
Customer: Non-relevant mark mere ko pata nahi kya hai kaise hai matlab woh dhang ki lead hai to main karunga.
Executive: Koi baat nahi, main batata hun, main batata hun. Ek baar sir mere ko ek baar meeting pe aap aa sakte ho abhi 10-15 minute chahiye zyada time nahi lunga par main aapko do teen cheezein batata hun jisse isko.
Customer: Time to sabse pehle.
Executive: Mera shubh naam Tejas hai sir. Mera Tejas naam hai sir aur aapka assigned ab lead manager main hi hun like mere se pehle aapki jo Priyanshi mam se baat hoti thi but kya hai na ki conversion haan to like kya hai to like abhi kya hai na ki sir kaafi saari cheezein hai jo improvements dikh rahe hai, hai na? To company ka bhi yahi kehna hai ki jo conversion hai woh apne end se mera expertise raha hai maine catalog engagement achcha karwaya aur conversion laake bhi diya hai. To mere ko diya gaya hai to like mere ko kaam karna hai aapke saath aisa nahi hai mere ko kaafi cheezein laake deni hai aapko isme kyunki dekho chhoti chhoti cheezein hai lekin dheere dheere hum convert kar payenge aur meeting to bohot saal ho gaye sir aapse kabhi connect kiye hue hai na?
Customer: Nahi nahi woh madam ne kari thi meeting.
Executive: Meeting meeting kiye the. Woh ki mere panel pe aa raha hai ki like 1200 din ho gaye hai kareeb kareeb. 1200 din to bohot hote hai sir. Matlab maan ke chaliye teen saare teen saal.
Customer: Meeting hoti hai matlab koi aaya nahi.
Executive: Meeting kuch nahi Google Meet pe.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi aise meeting Google Meeting hoti hai.
Executive: Haan haan to main aapko Google Meet ke aapke primary email ID pe link share kar raha hun, theek hai? Aur main apne manager ko bhi add kar raha hun to like kya hai na hum log milke aapko thoda sa guide karte hai cheezon ko leke cheezein aapki theek karwate hai. Aapko non-relevant feature batata hun pehle to auto refresher tool lagwa deta hun kyunki usse aapko fresh lead aana start hongi, theek hai? Aur uske baad aapko.
Customer: Auto refresher mein kaun sa time lagwaoge?
Executive: 24 ghante ki kya system hai isme sir.
Executive: Haan main isiliye to auto refresher tool laga raha hun na ki jisse aapko baithna nahi padega. Aapka ek side pe agar panel pe khula bhi rahega na account khula rahega to bhi kaam ho jayega. Usme aapka kaam bach jayega, aapka time bach jayega. Main aapko pehle yahi batata hun ki kam samay mein kya kya cheezein hum nikal sakte hai achchi, theek hai? Uske baad phir aapko thoda sa agar lagega na ki difference dikhega uske baad aap batana phir uske baad mapping bhi sahi karenge. Abhi mapping ke bare mein bhi thodi baat kar lete hai. To main aapko link share kar raha hun aapka email ID jo hai.
Customer: Aap kar dijiye main iske baad karte hai iske shuru mein.
Executive: Achha mujhe aap time bata dijiye sir phir kis time pe hum connect kar sakte hai.
Customer: 2:30 baje ke aas pass. 2:30 baje.
Executive: 2:30 baje ke aas pass. Theek hai main 2:30 baje ke aas pass aapko ek link share karunga usse aap meeting join kar lijiyega, theek hai? Phir screen share karke hum baat karte hai iske regarding pura.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Ho jayega sir solve, definitely ho jayega aap tension mat lijiye aapko Tejas naam yaad ho jayega.
Customer: Okay, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving irrelevant buyleads.

- Feels like wasting time on the platform.

- Expresses frustration with irrelevant inquiries.



Resolution:

- Executive offered a meeting to check product mapping.

- Executive will share a Google Meet link.

- Executive will explain the non-relevant feature.

- Executive will enable the auto-refresher tool.



Next Steps: 

- Meeting scheduled for 2:30 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, irrelevant inquiries, meeting, auto refresher, product mapping
